*Publisher's Description*

On November 20, 1979, hundreds of gunmen stunned the world by seizing
Islams holiest shrine, the Grand Mosque in Mecca. Trofimov interviews for
the first time scores of direct participants in the siege, including former
terrorists, and draws on hundreds of once-classified documents.
